column1: Zapala is a city and touristic destination in the Patagonian province of Neuquén
The city is located at the geographic center of the province at the confluence of national and provincial roads
column2: on a route to the Andes and Chile.  The city hosts a Loma Negra cement plant.Zapala is near the Laguna Blanca National Park and a ski resort and is situated in a steppe region
column4: which has small Araucaria forests and includes the nearby town of Aluminé and other towns.
